Nightlight/Windlord::

Nightlight dificulty stood up, and she slowly walked to Aerotaur, 
Birdbot's attacks had injuried her wings and she wouldn't able to fly 
in a while.

"Where's TRinity?" asked worried Nightlight to all bots that were 
there. Windlord answered

"She's with Starstomp, I tell them that they out base and hide while 
we control, the situation here" answered Windlord "I liked that 
Trinity didn't stay in base until this danger was over, I hope have 
done the best... It's seems that all danger has gone and They can 
come back."

"We must help Grounded too" said Nightlight.

"Yes we must" said Windlord while he moved where Terrataur and 
Grounded were.
